column5: will be heading up next week.. hows the fishing and what patterns should i expect?? love you long time.. bender out

We'll be at Evergreen next week also. It's our first time on Lac Seul so we're not sure what to expect. Maybe we'll see you there. I'll be the old grey bearded tired looking guy from Iowa who walks with a slight limp. :)

These are a bit dated (July 15-21) but should still help:https://www.walleyecentral.com/dc/dcb...d=53192&page=2https://www.walleyecentral.com/dc/dcb...d=53093&page=4 We had a blast at Evergreen - good luck! Dave
that pretty much describes everyone from iowa, doesn't it??? will you be there the week of the 12th? hope to see you ... jig
Heading to Gold Pines tomorrow. Any updates? Any hints any where to fish at this time and what baits? Don't have a big boat so don't want to go as far as Mc Kensie Bay. Thanks
Speak for yourself! I am still in denial even though my 10 year old refers to me as the "old geezer". IaCraig
